title: Orb
description: Three months outbound from Earth and the starship Desio approaches its planetary destination, her crew eager to commence a mission of scientific discovery. One crew member, however, has a personal reason for being on boardâ€”an obsession with self-reflection that will compel him to explore both the unknown depths of an enigmatic ocean world and the nebulous recesses of his inner psyche.
author: Gary Tarulli
